block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are Lee Siegel on Norman Mailer (pictured above); Alan Wolfe on Dinesh D'Souzza; Kiesk Schillinger on Roddy Doyle; and Dwight Garner, serior editor, with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhause, the editor of the Book Review, is the host.
Featued Author: A retrospective on the career of Norman Mailer, the author of ''The Castle in the Forest.''
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''The Castle in the Forest,'' by Norman Mailer; ''The Race Beat,'' by Gene Roberts and Hank Klibanoff; and other books.
Search: A free archive of book reviews since 1981.
Books Update E-Mail: Receive a selective overview of new book reviews and features every Sunday.
